<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Among the Shadows](/Articles.aspx?ID=67)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 62</row>

Peer past shifting shadows to learn the secrets of the grasping undead that lurk between light and darkness.
name: Among the Shadows
